mapper.select: SELECT T.ORG_NM, --기관명 CASE WHEN T.COMM_ITEM_COUNT >0 THEN TO_CHAR(T.COMM_ITEM_COUNT) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(ROUND(T.COMM_ITEM_COUNT / (T.ORG_ITEM_COUNT* 1.0) * 100.0,2))||'%' ELSE '0' END AS COMM_ITEM_COUNT_RATE, --공통표준 용어 T.ORG_ITEM_COUNT, --기관표준 용어 CASE WHEN T.COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT > 0 THEN TO_CHAR(T.COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(ROUND(T.COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT / (T.ORG_DOMAIN_COUNT * 1.0) * 100.0,2))||'%' ELSE '0' END AS COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT_RATE, --공통표준 도메인 T.ORG_DOMAIN_COUNT, --기관표준 도메인 CASE WHEN T.COMM_WORD_COUNT > 0 THEN TO_CHAR(T.COMM_WORD_COUNT) || ' / ' || TO_CHAR(ROUND(T.COMM_WORD_COUNT / (T.ORG_WORD_COUNT* 1.0) * 100.0,2))||'%' ELSE '0' END AS COMM_WORD_COUNT_RATE, --공통표준 단어 T.ORG_WORD_COUNT --기관표준 단어 FROM (SELECT WO.ORG_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS ORG_ITEM_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DMN WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS ORG_DOMAIN_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_STWD WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM) AS ORG_WORD_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_SDITM A INNER JOIN (SELECT SDITM_LNM,SDITM_PNM,INFOTP_LNM FROM WAM_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON (A.SDITM_LNM =B.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM =B.INFOTP_LNM) ) AS COMM_ITEM_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_DMN A INNER JOIN (SELECT INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON(A.INFOTP_LNM=B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE) ) AS COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_STWD A INNER JOIN (SELECT STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM) B ON(A.ENG_MEAN=B.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_PNM) ) AS COMM_WORD_COUNT FROM WAA_ORG WO WHERE WO.ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgNm}, '%') ) T

select T.org_nm, count(itemCount) AS ORG_ITEM_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM=T.ORG_NM) AS DB_ITEM_COUNT --DB표준 단어 수 from (select A.org_nm ,count(*) as itemCount , a.sditm_lnm , a.sditm_pnm , a.infotp_lnm from wam_sditm a inner join wam_db_sditm B on (a.sditm_lnm = B.sditm_lnm and a.sditm_pnm = B.sditm_pnm and a.infotp_lnm = B.infotp_lnm and a.org_nm = B.org_nm) inner join waa_org C on (C.target_yn='Y' and a.org_nm = C.org_nm) where a.confirm_yn ='Y' and b.confirm_yn ='Y' group by a.org_nm , a.sditm_lnm , a.sditm_pnm , a.infotp_lnm ) T group by T.org_nm

select T.org_nm, count(T.itemCount) as ORG_CODE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wam_db_comm_cd WHERE ORG_NM=T.ORG_NM and confirm_yn='Y') as DB_CODE_COUNT from (select A.org_nm ,count(*) as itemCount ,A.comm_cd_nm ,A.comn_cd_ennm ,A.comm_dtl_cd_mn FROM wam_comm_cd A inner join wam_db_comm_cd B on (A.comm_cd_nm =B.comm_cd_nm AND A.comn_cd_ennm = B.comn_cd_ennm AND A.comm_dtl_cd_mn =B.comm_dtl_cd_mn and A.org_nm = B.org_nm) WHERE A.confirm_yn='Y' and B.confirm_yn='Y' group by A.org_nm, A.comm_cd_nm, A.comn_cd_ennm, A.comm_dtl_cd_mn ) T group by T.org_nm

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT WO.ORG_NM, WO.DB_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_SDITM A INNER JOIN (SELECT SDITM_LNM,SDITM_PNM,INFOTP_LNM FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM AND db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON (A.SDITM_LNM =B.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = B.SDITM_PNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM =B.INFOTP_LNM) ) AS COMM_ITEM_COUNT, --공통표준 용어 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT sditm_lnm,sditm_pnm, infotp_lnm FROM wam_sditm WHERE INSTR(#{orgNm} , ORG_NM)) A INNER JOIN (SELECT sditm_lnm,sditm_pnm, infotp_lnm FROM wam_db_sditm WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM AND db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON(A.sditm_lnm=B.sditm_lnm AND A.sditm_pnm = B.sditm_pnm and a.infotp_lnm = b.infotp_lnm) ) AS ORG_ITEM_COUNT, --기관표준 단어 일치 수 (SELECT rqst_dtm FROM wam_sditm WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS ORG_ITEM_RQST_DTM, -- ORG 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) AS DB_ITEM_COUNT, --DB표준 용어 수 (SELECT to_char(rqst_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM WAM_DB_SDITM WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS DB_ITEM_RQST_DTM, -- DB 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_DMN A INNER JOIN (SELECT INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON (A.INFOTP_LNM=B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE) ) AS COMM_DOMAIN_COUNT, --공통표준 도메인 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ORG_NM, INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DMN WHERE INSTR(#{orgNm} , ORG_NM)) A INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_NM, INFOTP_LNM,DATA_LEN,DATA_TYPE FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM AND db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON(A.INFOTP_LNM=B.INFOTP_LNM AND A.DATA_LEN = B.DATA_LEN AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE and A.org_nm = B.org_nm) ) AS ORG_DOMAIN_COUNT, --기관표준 도메인 일치 수 (SELECT rqst_dtm FROM WAM_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS ORG_DOMAIN_RQST_DTM, -- ORG 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) AS DB_DOMAIN_COUNT, --DB표준 도메인 수 (SELECT to_char(rqst_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM WAM_DB_DMN WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS DB_DOMAIN_RQST_DTM, -- 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_STWD A INNER JOIN (SELECT STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON(A.STWD_LNM=B.STWD_LNM AND A.ENG_MEAN = B.STWD_PNM)) AS COMM_WORD_COUNT, --공통표준 단어 일치 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ORG_NM, STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_STWD WHERE INSTR(#{orgNm} , ORG_NM)) A INNER JOIN (SELECT ORG_NM, STWD_LNM,STWD_PNM FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM AND db_nm = WO.DB_NM) B ON(A.STWD_LNM=B.STWD_LNM AND A.STWD_PNM = B.STWD_PNM and A.org_nm = B.org_nm) ) AS ORG_WORD_COUNT, --기관표준 단어 일치 수 (SELECT rqst_dtm FROM WAM_STWD WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS ORG_WORD_RQST_DTM, -- ORG 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) AS DB_WORD_COUNT, --DB표준 단어 수 (SELECT to_char(rqst_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM WAM_DB_STWD WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM order by rqst_dtm limit 1) AS DB_WORD_RQST_DTM, -- 제정일자 (select count(*) from ( SELECT comm_cd_nm,comn_cd_ennm, comm_dtl_cd_mn FROM wam_comm_cd where INSTR(#{orgNm} , ORG_NM) intersect SELECT comm_cd_nm,comn_cd_ennm, comm_dtl_cd_mn FROM wam_db_comm_cd where ORG_NM = WO.org_nm and DB_NM = WO.db_nm)) AS ORG_CODE_COUNT, --기관표준 코드 일치 수 (SELECT writ_dtm FROM wam_comm_cd WHERE ORG_NM = WO.ORG_NM order by writ_dtm limit 1) AS ORG_CODE_RQST_DTM, -- ORG 제정일자 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wam_db_comm_cd WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM) AS DB_CODE_COUNT, --DB표준 코드 수 (SELECT to_char(writ_dtm,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM wam_db_comm_cd WHERE ORG_NM=WO.ORG_NM and db_nm = WO.DB_NM order by writ_dtm limit 1) AS DB_CODE_RQST_DTM -- 제정일자 FROM (select a.org_nm, b.db_nm from WAA_ORG a inner join waa_org_db b on (a.org_cd = b.org_cd)) WO ) T where T.ORG_NM = #{orgNm}
and T.DB_NM = #{dbNm}
